title: Will get any player OCS if they read this!
body:
Hello there Summoner! 

Yes you read the title right I have recently quit coaching/managing an OCS team and have given it up to be a full time mentor. As a coach and someone who has had to scout for players I have come to find that there are very few ripe apples to pick from the apple tree on the OCE farm. That is why I have put pen to paper to come up with an idea that I'm going to help players to improve so that we have a healthier competitive scene. If you are not serious and are not a person who puts effort in please stop reading here. This is for serious people only! Now lets get something straight so that you understand a coach and a mentor are two different things. A coach is someone who teaches, trains and tutors. A mentor is an advisor. So if you know becoming pro in league is something you want to do your best way of getting there is working through me. I know what teams are looking for and I know exactly how to get there all it takes is a very small amount of money and your effort and time. I don't want to go into any detail of what I do and how it works because that will be exposing the methods. I'm keeping myself hidden for the moment so am not going to link a discord or anything because my new discord account is unknown aswell. But yeah add me on league and I'll give you the rundown. Also I want to add that the higher rank you are the easier it is for me to mentor so lower ranks may be a higher price but am happy to work around it. First 5 people that come to me I'll do the most of it free.

replies.body: I somehow doubt an OCS coach would be Bronze V 0 LP in Flex Queue... literally the queue that is all about teams
So, post some examples of your past work? so far it all blind faith on what you are saying is the truth.

Hi glad to hear your interest and can understand some players may be thinking the same thing. I am unfortunately wanting to make a new identity for myself so explaining my past helps people identify who I am. If you want to know more about me I can explain this more personally on league but am not sharing it to the public.
You do know people that talks to you can also leak it right? What is the point of concealing something you will share to others.
If their are spots opened, I'd like to discuss things with you further, sent you a friend request!
